title: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label height does not change right away.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the label settings.
3. Modify the font size of the label.
4. Observe the label height.

Actual Behavior (OB): The label height remains the same even after modifying the font size.

Expected Behavior (EB): The label height should adjust according to the new font size.

Suggested Resolution (SR): Change the label content and observe if the height is justified with the font size.
